PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13152022-12-15HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Hazardous Products Regulations (GHS, Seventh Revised Edition)
PrecisRegulations Amending the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (GHS, SEVENTH REVISED EDITION) in order to (1) align the Regulations with the seventh revised edition of the Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals (GHS); (2) adopt a new physical hazard class, Chemicals Under Pressure, from the eighth revised edition of the GHS; (3) clarify and amend the certain provisions of the Regulations to better reflect the original intent; and (4) make minor administrative updates to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0272 Publication Date: 2023-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Hazardous Products Regulations (GHS, Seventh Revised Edition)
precis: Regulations Amending the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (GHS, SEVENTH REVISED EDITION) in order to (1) align the Regulations with the seventh revised edition of the Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals (GHS); (2) adopt a new physical hazard class, Chemicals Under Pressure, from the eighth revised edition of the GHS; (3) clarify and amend the certain provisions of the Regulations to better reflect the original intent; and (4) make minor administrative updates to the Regulations.
